channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire; INC#1853; 10:47PM; 1370 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NwgUnK; #CentralAlameda; Detached garage with fire showing, and structures threatened on three sides.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E17 E209 E210 RA14 T10; CH7; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1637; 10:04PM; 226 N Lake St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r79D6a; #Westlake; 24 Firefighters extinguished the two vehicles on fire, keeping the flames from spreading into the nearby commercial building. No reported injuries. Nothing further.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E209 E220 E52 RA20 T20 T9; CH5; 2; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1637; 09:36PM; 226 N Lake St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r79D6a; #Westlake; Two autos on fire, exposing a one-story commercial structure. Offensive mode.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E209 E52 RA20 T9; CH5; 2; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1566; 09:10PM; 3900 N Pueblo Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3re2gdh; #ElSereno; Firefighters extinguished a quarter-acre brush fire that burned one out building (approximately 40' x 40' shed). No reported injuries. ; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 BP47 CW3A CW3B E1 E16 E2 E201 E202 E212 E290 E44 E47 E90 EM1 EM13 EM14 H2 H3 H4 H6 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA6 T1 T12 T2 T90; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1087; 05:31PM; 1340 N Stadium Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CVJslP; #ElysianPark; Approximately 75 LAFD firefighters worked by ground and air to hold the brush fire to two acres, in 46 minutes. LAFD volunteer Crew 3, and volunteer CERT members responded to support firefighters. No structures were damaged. No reported injuries. Crews will remain on scene to fortify perimeter lines and extinguish hot spots within the burn footprint. Nothing further.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 CE43 CM20 CM22 CW3A CW3B E1 E10 E16 E2 E201 E209 E290 E3 E4 E44 E47 E56 E6 E9 E90 EA1 EM11 H2 H3 H4 H6 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA6 HT3 RA1 T1 T90; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1087; 04:45PM; 1340 N Stadium Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CVJslP; #ElysianPark; Approximately two acres of light-to-medium brush burning, with approximately 5 mph winds.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 CW3A CW3B E1 E10 E16 E2 E201 E209 E290 E3 E4 E44 E47 E56 E6 E9 E90 EM11 H2 H3 H4 H6 HA2 HA3 HA4 HA6 RA1 T1 T90; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

Pedestrian Fatality; INC#1600; 09:11PM; 700 N Fries Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46MjdMr; #Wilmington; PRELIM: 36 year-old male reportedly in the roadway, possibly igniting fireworks when struck by a sport utility vehicle. Thrown a distance, he landed partially beneath but was not trapped by another vehicle exiting a shopping center parking lot. The man was determined deceased and remains at the scene. No other persons injured. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #4195) and Medical Examiner.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E38 E49 E85 EM13 HR3 RA101 RA85 T38; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#1431; 08:01PM; 7719 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XBx5EN; #StudioCity; Despite volatile brush burning in steep terrain fanned by light winds, the first arriving 30 LAFD ground responders aided by precise helicopter water drops, were able to confine flames to one-quarter (0.25) acre of light-to-heavy brush in 45 minutes. No injury. No structure threat. No structure damage. No evacuation. Firefighters will remain at the scene for the next hour-and-a-half to complete extinguishment and mop up. Though witnesses vividly describe the earlier illegal use of personal fireworks in the area, the specific cause of the fire remains the focus of an active LAFD investigation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC14 CE59 E108 E278 E41 E52 E76 E97 EM14 H3 H4 H6 HA3 HA4 HA6 T78; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#1431; 07:16PM; 7719 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XBx5EN; #StudioCity; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to 30' x 50' light-to-heavy brush burning slowly downhill in steep terrain. Winds out of southwest at 7 MPH. No imminent structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC5 E108 E260 E278 E41 E76 E86 E90 E97 EM14 H3 H4 H6 HA3 HA4 HA6 T60 T78; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Hiker Rescue; INC#0496; 10:15AM; Rim of The Valley Trail; MAP: https://bit.ly/438jPc3; #Tujunga; The ill hiker, now described as a 44 year-old female in fair condition, is adamantly refusing hospital transport. Given her remote location near Mount Lukens, the hovering LAFD rescue helicopter will hoist her aboard and transport her to a safe location at the base of the San Gabriel Mountains, where she will again be offered transportation via a ground-based LAFD ambulance, or be required to confirm her refusal of continued care. ; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC12 E24 E274 E290 E6 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA74 RA90 RH114 T74 T90; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
